text: The following is a list of deputy or lieutenant governors of the State of Connecticut, from the Colonial period until now. ==List== Lieutenant Governors of the State of Connecticut Lieutenant Governor Term in office Party Election Governor 21 Matthew Griswold - May 13, 1784 Federalist 1776 Jonathan Trumbull 1777 1778 1779 1780 1781 1782 1783 22 Samuel Huntington - May 11, 1786 Federalist 1784 Matthew Griswold 1785 23 Oliver Wolcott - January 5, 1796 Federalist 1786 Samuel Huntington 1787 1788 1789 1790 1791 1792 1793 1794 1795 -- Vacant - May 12, 1796 -- Oliver Wolcott 24 Jonathan Trumbull Jr. - December 1, 1796 Federalist 1796 1797 -- Vacant - May 11, 1797 -- Jonathan Trumbull Jr. 25 John Treadwell - August 7, 1809 Federalist 1797 1798 1799 1800 1801 1802 1803 1804 1805 1806 1807 1808 1809 -- Vacant - May 10, 1810 -- John Treadwell 26 Roger Griswold - May 9, 1811 Federalist 1810 27 John Cotton Smith - October 25, 1812 Federalist 1811 Roger Griswold 1812 -- Vacant - May 13, 1813 -- John Cotton Smith 28 Chauncey Goodrich - August 18, 1815 Federalist 1813 1814 1815 -- Vacant - May 9, 1816 -- 29 Jonathan Ingersoll - January 12, 1823 Democratic- Republican 1816 Toleration Party 1817 Oliver Wolcott Jr. 1818 1819 1820 1821 1822 -- Vacant - May 7, 1823 -- 30 David Plant - May 2, 1827 National Republican 1823 1824 1825 1826 31 John Samuel Peters - March 2, 1831 National Republican 1827 Gideon Tomlinson 1828 1829 1830 -- Vacant - May 4, 1831 -- John Samuel Peters 32 Thaddeus Betts - May 1, 1833 National Republican 1831 1832 33 Ebenezer Stoddard - May 7, 1834 Democratic 1833 Henry W.
